title: Learner-Generated Virtual Patient Curriculum Design for Surgical Residents

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic surgical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning where learners directly create and utilize virtual patient cases in a digital environment

learning_goals: Learners can design virtual patient cases tailored to surgical simulation scenarios.
Learners can enhance clinical reasoning skills through peer-created virtual patient cases.
Learners can achieve a 10% or higher improvement in summative assessment scores.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
